text: Very customer service friendly. Easy to get in contact with. Quick responses.
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Mr. Mancia!"]

text: The quick response was very helpful and informative as to what documents I needed and how to get them!
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Mr. Cooper!"]

text: Refinancing has been a hassle. They have decided they need to see my current paycheck deposit . Even though I use 2 accounts. There is nothing on their website or emails that state they need to see payroll deposits. They make up rules as they go. It is not a typical payday loan. I set up an allotment and have been timely for over a year the zero issues in a stable government job.  They just made up a rule.
replies: ["Thank you for your continued business, Ms. Yates. However, a 30-day bank statement is now a required document, which is included in our required documents under our apply now tab on our website. It is required because the debit card to the account is our collateral on our loans. Please reach out if you have further questions."]

text: Thank you all for always a great experience.
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Ms. Rubin!"]

text: Good customer service very easy and patient
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Ms. Minnitt!"]

text: The people on the phone were extremely helpful. The process was very quick. I Wish you had a better / easier process when refinancing. Other companies have it 5x easier to do so. (no need to prove bank information if going to same as before) just needed updated payroll.
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Mr. Erglis!"]

text: Response from this company is immediate. Every email that is sent provides clear instructions. I’m very satisfied.

text: Customer service was top notch and the process was very smooth and easy to follow.

text: Excellent service! Fund account in a timely manner

text: Good customer service. Thank you, Nick!

text: They were very helpful and a fast process

text: So many turned me down but auperiif funding was highly recommended by my peers ! They helped me tremendously and the experience was super easy and they totally met all my financial needs ! I am recommending them to all my co workers so their financial needs can be met as well
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Ms. Meachum! Remember our referral bonus you can earn if your coworker(s) you recommend us to qualify and get a loan with us!"]

text: Upon applying to Superior Funding I was initially denied because they were not able to fund my department at that time. 2 days later they emailed and asked if I was still interested. The process was quick and easy. Any questions I had were answered and the service was great. I received my loan fast. Highly recommend.
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Ms. Holliday!"]

text: No text
replies: ["Thank you for your business!"]

text: Since I learned all the steps needed to refinance, things are going much smoother, and FAST! It’s a little frustrating at first, to learn how to make a pdf file and sign the pda, w/o it looks like a kindergartner wrote it, lol, but once you learn all that, easy breezy.
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Mrs. Williams!"]

text: Excellent customer service! I was not sure how to do the paperwork, so I called a few times (or more lol) they were always so helpful, patient, and kind. No matter how much I called or how many questions I asked, they were polite, knowledgeable, and made it simple and easy. I would highly recommend to my friends, family, and anyone reading this that may need cash fast! A big THANK YOU to SUPERIOR FUNDING for being there when I needed you the most... all the way around!!! From Great customer support to fast funding...You are awesome!!
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Ms. Benfield!"]

text: Awesome customer service and the process was very fast and easy.
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Ms. Bryant!"]

text: I needed assist from the representative and when I called I actually got a live person!! The 2 different ladies I talked to were friendly and so helpful. I enjoyed speaking to a human and no jumping through hoops to get them on the phone.
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Ms. Wickings!"]

text: I have been using these amazing guys for years!! They are always there whenever I need them. They are quick to work on your paperwork and they process everything in a timely manner. I would definitely recommend them to others!! Thank you all for always being nice
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Ms. Pitts!"]

text: I was referred to Superior Funding by a senior coworker during training earlier this year. It’s taken a few tries in getting approved. Today, I was respectfully granted the opportunity to receive funds to support my current budget.
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Ms. Lambert!"]

text: The patients and quickness of the representative who service me made applying easy and even if I had not got the loan the thoughtfulness would have made it ok. . I had a loan with them before and paid if off and my experience was great then. I would and have recommend anyone who they allow to apply, apply. Thanks Always

text: Everytime I call everyone is always polite and answers all my questions even when I have several. Lol

text: Superior Funding provides excellent service in those in need. The process is very quick and easy I recommend them to anyone who need a quick loan. There customer service reps are the best. Keep up the good work ladies.

text: The whole process is so simple and the agents are really prompt with repo ding and answering any questions!!

text: Efficient and smooth. If you mess up and sign incorrectly they are on it quick. Let you know and try to help asap. Love them. Good job!!!!

text: I appreciate it that they kept reaching out to me to see if I still need it alone. + My loan officer was sweet and funny and very knowledgeable. I will recommend you to other USPS employees

text: Thank you from the bottom of my heart. I was kind of skeptical about this transaction because I was literally just scammed about 2 weeks ago by applying for a loan online. You guys were great and was patient the whole process. Thank you
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Ms. Criswell!"]

text: It was a fairly easy process. Communication was awesome! The only complaint I have and it is more on my side than your side is if someone doesn’t have monthly bills with their physical address because they have a Po Box the PO Box should be good enough if it is in the same town. I am sure I was a weird case though.
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Ms. Taylor!"]

text: First great thing. I applied for postal allotment loan and was approved. I had a very difficult time with the final papers that were required in the end as I am a cell phone dummy. They were over the top polite helpful and PATIENT with me to get it finalized. Thanks again!
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Ms. Moergeli!"]

text: Superior is an easy process. So long as you provide the documentation required they provide you with a fast answer. The ability to refinance every 6 months is great as well. Highly recommend.

text: Brandy and Adoesha are so sweet and nice. They always make my experience so uncomplicated. Kuddos to them every time. thanks ladies keep up the above and beyond work

text: Love them no one would approve me for an allotment loan but they did they were easy breast the process was so sweet and funds were in my account the next day way to go!!!

text: The people are very helpful staff of people,

text: I love the service but the process sucks. Even though you close at three, you should be able to keep the documents to the next day to start the process. I shouldn’t have to redo it every day. It makes no sense but it’s a great service anyway thank you.
replies: ["Thank you for your business, Ms. Goins! Because of the way our loan system is set up with daily interest accrual, everything must be done in the same day. We apologize for the inconvenience."]

text: The representatives made sure I knew what to do and was there for any questions I had. I really appreciate that.

text: They are wonder was approved in 2 days an I thank superior lending me in a such time like this.they rescue me.....
